title: Projects
text:

title: Deri Siswara
text:
I take gigs as a research/data analyst. Experienced in survey design, creating dashboards, impact assessment, econometric modeling, and teaching.
I’m open to collaborations, projects, or new opportunities.

Read More →

title: Talks that Last
text:
Introduction to Quarto 
                
            
            
                May 11, 2025 ∙ 
                Online
                
                
                | Bahasa
                
            
            Have a chance for sharing about the Quarto framework in the BelajaR community. The slides and code exercises are provided below.
